channel.title: [508] Problem with adding my Rules
channel.description:
Hello!
I tried to add my Rules with 2 Languages. I used a 2 Option ChatboxInterface.
This is my Code in ActionButtons.java
[code] case 228: if (buttonId == 2) { p.getActionSender().showInterface(p, 227);[/code]
it should open the interface 227 by clicking the button 2 but nothing happends
